# Description

The data were collected in 2022 from a sample of students enrolled on the ASDS programme at Trinity College, Dublin, and comprise a variable for height and sex.

# Format

A .csv file with 33 observations on 2 (numeric) variables.

| [,1] `height` &nbsp;&nbsp; centimetres
| [,2] `sex` &nbsp;&nbsp; 0 = ?, 1 = ?
